Sentencas: Strontium-doped lanthanum manganite (La1-xSrxMnO3) is a commonly used cathode in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: The synthesis, thermal stability, crystal structure and spectroscopic study of La0.80Sr0.20MnO3 powder obtained by the modified Pechini's method

Sentencas: In this study, La0.80Sr0.20MnO3 powder was prepared by the modified Pechini's method using gelatin as the polymerizing agent.
Titulo: The synthesis, thermal stability, crystal structure and spectroscopic study of La0.80Sr0.20MnO3 powder obtained by the modified Pechini's method

Sentencas: The polymeric resin obtained was characterized by thermogravimetric analysis and the powder calcined at 900 degrees C for 4 h has been characterized by X-ray diffraction, scanning electron microscopy and infrared spectroscopy.
Titulo: The synthesis, thermal stability, crystal structure and spectroscopic study of La0.80Sr0.20MnO3 powder obtained by the modified Pechini's method

Sentencas: The La0.80Sr0.20MnO3 phase exhibited rhombohedral symmetry.
Titulo: The synthesis, thermal stability, crystal structure and spectroscopic study of La0.80Sr0.20MnO3 powder obtained by the modified Pechini's method

Sentencas: The infrared reflectance spectrum was dominated by a conduction mechanism besides the signature of less pronounced phonon features, characteristics of the crystal lattice.
Titulo: The synthesis, thermal stability, crystal structure and spectroscopic study of La0.80Sr0.20MnO3 powder obtained by the modified Pechini's method

Sentencas: The present results indicated that the gelatin has been an efficient directional element to be used in La0.80Sr0.20MnO3 synthesis, and it is a low cost material, non toxic and makes the polymeric precursor synthesis less complicated.
Titulo: The synthesis, thermal stability, crystal structure and spectroscopic study of La0.80Sr0.20MnO3 powder obtained by the modified Pechini's method
